definitions.definition: That which distinguishes ; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation , discrimination .
The act of distinguishing, discriminating; discrimination .
examples: There is a distinction to be made between resting and slacking.

definitions.definition: A feature that causes someone or something to stand out from others of its type.

subdefinitions.definition: A feature that causes someone or something to stand out as being better ; a mark of honour , rank , eminence or excellence ; the quality of being distinguished .
examples: She had the distinction of meeting the Queen.

main_definition: That which distinguishes ; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation , discrimination .
secondary_definitions: The act of distinguishing, discriminating; discrimination .
A feature that causes someone or something to stand out from others of its type.
